code.displayName: Thrombolysis of coronary artery by intravenous infusion

list.item:
Crushing central chest pain:
Radiating to left arm- indicated by patient on regaining consciousness.

Syncope and Collapse:
Patients collapse heard by wife approximately 10 minutes before calling emergency services.

Inferior myocardial infarction:
Indicated by ECG (STEMI III/AVF).
On renal dialysis.Next session due Friday.

Thrombolysis of coronary artery by intravenous infusion:
Status: Performed.
Time: 1-May-2006 21:49.

Emergency hospital admission
Destination Location:
Northern General Hospital
Herries Road
Sheffield
South Yorkshire
S5 7AU

item.content:
Streptokinase, 1500000 units, intravenous.
Time of Administration: 2-May-2006 20:50
